titleStmt.title: The reasons of the Dissenting Brethren against the third proposition, concerning presbyterial government· Humbly presented.
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly

titleStmt.title: The reasons of the Dissenting Brethren against the third proposition, concerning presbyterial government· Humbly presented.
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly
Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.

Westminster Assembly (1643-1652). Answer of the Assembly of Divines unto the reasons of the seven Dissenting Brethren, against the proposition of divers congregations being united under one Presbyteriall government.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.M. for Ralph Smith at the Bible in Corne-Hill,

notesStmt.note: Signed on F1r: Tho. Goodwin [and six others].
With a preliminary order to print.

"The answer of the Assembly of Divines unto the reasons of the seven Dissenting Brethren, against the proposition of divers congregations being united under one presbyteriall government" has separate title page dated 1644; pagination and register are continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "about feb: 5th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
